history.proof: intros xs a Hsorted Hinh. split. - intros a' Hin. qsimpl use: in_inv. - qsimpl use: in_inv.

exceptions.tactic: apply List.in_inv in Hin as [Heq | Hin].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \\/ In b l" on hypothesis of type "In a' xs".
The reference lia was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply Hinh in Hin as [Hlt Hle].

original: intros xs a Hsorted Hinh. split. - intros a' Hin. apply List.in_inv in Hin as [Heq | Hin]. + subst. split; [lia | lia]. + apply Hinh in Hin as [Hlt Hle]. split; [lia | lia]. - apply Hsorted.
